input_text:
Job Title: Angular Developer

Location: Pittsburgh, PA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Compensation Range:

$66.00 per hour

Welcome to IntePros, a certified woman-owned company specializing in innovative and results-oriented recruiting and staffing solutions. We take immense pride in genuinely understanding what drives and inspires exceptional individuals like you. Your success is our priority, and we are dedicated to actively shaping your long-term career journey. At IntePros, we believe in comprehensive well-being. You have access to our medical, dental, vision, and mental health programs, ensuring your health and wellness are taken care of. To support your continuous growth, we also provide a $1,500 per year education and professional certification fund. Diversity and inclusion are cornerstones of our company ethos. IntePros is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We do not discriminate in employment on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, pregnancy, gender identity, national origin, sexual orientation, disability, age, veteran or military status, retaliation, or any other characteristic protected by law. We celebrate the rich tapestry of backgrounds and perspectives that make us stronger as a team. Please note that only qualified individuals being considered will be contacted. We appreciate your interest and look forward to potentially embarking on a transformative journey together.

IntePros is excited to partner with a Fortune 200 Investment Banking and Financial Company in helping them identify a Angular Developer for a critical engagement in Pittsburgh, PA.

We're looking for a UI developer (not a designer) who will be expanding and maintaining our Asset library based on PrimeNG Angular component library. Also, this person would need to be able to assist various development teams in the UI development of page elements and components using HTML, CSS, JavaScript etc. Should be proficient in the latest front end/UI development.

Required Skills/Experience: Preferred Skills/ Experience:

1 PrimeNG and Angular is a must 1 Front-End development2 HTML/CSS 2 UI Libraries3 JavaScript 3 Design Systems5+ years experienceBe comfortable in a leadership or team member role.Contribute to the long-term vision of our platforms from a user perspective.Provide creative leadership on new product ideas and keep abreast of industry trends and best practices.Work with the visual design team to implement visual styles that support platform branding, look and feel, and increase user effectiveness.Create and maintain user interface and visual design standards and guidelines.Great collaboration and individual problem-solving skills required for data gathering, identifying insights and creating optimal solutions in the user experience. Knowledge of PrimeNG and Angular is a must.


Desirable skills:

Working knowledge of the financial services industry, security markets, and regulations.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Angular Developer
output_json.summary: Angular Developer position at IntePros partnering with a Fortune 200 Investment Banking and Financial Company.
soft_skills: Creating optimal solutions in the user experience
job_responsibilities: Expanding and maintaining Asset library based on PrimeNG Angular component library
Assisting various development teams in UI development of page elements and components using HTML, CSS, JavaScript
Contribution to the long-term vision of platforms from a user perspective
Providing creative leadership on new product ideas
Keeping abreast of industry trends and best practices
Working with the visual design team to implement visual styles supporting platform branding
Creating and maintaining user interface and visual design standards and guidelines
benefits: $1,500 per year education and professional certification fund

We do not discriminate in employment on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, pregnancy, gender identity, national origin, sexual orientation, disability, age, veteran or military status, retaliation, or any other characteristic protected by law.
